Contact access
We need contacts permission to contact them
You denied contacts permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.

Camera access
We need camera permission to take photos
You denied camera permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.
You gave access to camera. Thanks!

Media Image Access
We need media image access to show and save your pictures
You denied media image access permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.
You gave access to media image. Thanks!
You permanently denied media image permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.

Write external access
We need write external storage permission to save your pictures

You gave access to write external storage. Thanks!

Read External access
We need storage read permission to show your pictures

You gave access to read external storage. Thanks!

Manage External Storage access
We need manage external storage permission to show your pictures
You denied manage external storage permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.
You gave manage external storage permission. Thanks!
You permanently denied manage external storage permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.

Location Access
We need access to your location to know where you are
